divs: Sighting DetailsSitting in our backyard I noticed one UFO flying at a distance through the trees in my neighbor's yard. Thought it was too bright and orange to be a plane or helicopter. Walked around to to get a better view and then noticed 2nd ufo, exact same color and size, flying slightly behind the first at about 8 o'clock. I freaked out and asked my wife, 'what the hell is that?' They flew a little closer in a northwestern direction, slowed and then stopped completely. Very bright and very orange. At this point I knew we were seeing something strange. Both objects hovered over area of Chico, CA for about about 2 minutes. 2nd UFO faded and then disappeared. 1st UFO lasted about 10 seconds longer and then quickly disappeared. We were very shocked and amazed.
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Chico
There were no other sightings in Chico on or around April 7th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
